name: Madness Accelerant 2022
description:
This is my tribute to Madness Accelerant.

This game was one of my favorite games that impacted my childhood, which is why I remade it. But this time it is 3D.

I didn't put all the levels in it due to my hectic exam college schedule. However, I had a lot of fun making it.

Install instructions
  • Download .zip file
  • Place it in a folder on you desktop
  • Right click > Extract Here
  • Double click on Madness Accelerant.exe
  • Drink tea & Enjoy
